short_description: hotel la classic is a hotel based in bengaluru, india.
long_description: la classic is a beautifully appointed, centrally located to industrial hubs on hosur main road, people friendly 4 star boutique hotel that has made a practice of exceeding expectations of guests. the hotel combines great ambience with impeccable personalized service. we are driven by our philosophy of "building relationships" with our guests with service that anticipates and fulfills your smallest needs. if you are a business traveler visiting south bangalore, la classic is the ideal location to set up your base. this business hotel is at close proximity to tvs, titan, biocon, kirloskar, skf, videocon, buheler, schniedher electric, ashrivad pipes, micro labs, exide batteries, ashok leyland, sapic, bata , hmg granites just to name a few. narayana hrudayalaya, mujamdar cancer center are few hospitals in the vicinity.

generated_description: hotel la classic is a 4-star boutique hotel located on hosur main road in attibele, bangalore. the hotel offers 76 guest rooms, including 8 suites, and is centrally located to industrial hubs such as attibelle industrial area, bommasandra industrial area and hosur industrial area. the business hotel is in close proximity to various companies including tvs, titan, biocon, kirloskar, skf, videocon, buheler, schniedher electric, ashrivad pipes, micro labs, exide batteries, ashok leyland, sapic, bata, and hmg granites. hotel la classic prides itself on providing personalized service and building relationships with its guests.
